newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: SOCCER-BENFICA WIN TO TOP PORTUGUESE LEAGUE.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-BENFICA WIN TO TOP PORTUGUESE LEAGUE.

text.p: Benfica beat Chaves 3-0 at home on Monday to knock Lisbon rivals Sporting off the top of the Portuguese league.

Brazilian midfielder Valdo Filho scored from a freekick to put the home side ahead after just 16 minutes. But Benfica then had to withstand some heavy pressure from Chaves before two goals in the final minutes gave them victory by a flattering margin.
Benfica lead Sporting by goal difference with both sides on 13 points, two ahead of reigning champions Porto.
